name: Hardest Flappy Bird-ie - Don’t Touch The Pipes
name_original: Hardest Flappy Bird-ie - Don’t Touch The Pipes
description:
Hardest Flappy Bird-ie - Don’t Touch The Pipes is one of addictive casual arcade game.
You can tap in any point of screen to jump and flap the bird but beware and don’t touch the pipes. If the bird touches a side of screen, you can score a point and your bird will turn back to the other side.
Thanks for downloading ‘Hardest Flappy Bird-ie’ and enjoy it. :-)
